attributes.action: Propose a Free Vote to Members of Parliament  to Elect a New Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned feel that the "deal" between Tony Blair and Gordon Brown nominating Mr. Brown as the sucessor to Mr. Blair is both undemocratic and unconstitutional.
It smacks both of nepotism and an almost monarchistic approach to the United Kingdom's system of rule. 
We did not vote for Mr. Brown, nor did we understand that he would be put into the position of Prime Minister purely on the word of one who is abandoning the post in favour of the money spinning "lecture circuit". 
We therefore call for a vote to determine the future leader of our country.
